page.title: 07Buckden Cruel Tree
page.content:
In the olden days if you committed suicide or murder you couldn't be buried in the churchyard.You were buried at crossroads & if possible by the parish boundary because some people believed that they might become {earthbound ghosts}& this would confuse them.To make it safer they put a wooden stake between their bones.If it rooted and became a tree the ghost couldn't move.It is believed this happened at Buckden.Records show that the tree was cut down in 1865.
A rather curious story started in Cluny Manor House.A lady reading saw {an old lady}pass and disappear.She found out that every new bride had seen her.She{welcomed}the brides to the Manor.
